description: Renn Global is an alternative asset management firm focused on the technology venture ecosystem. Renn's innovative model is driven by committed private, closed end funds in conjunction with a proprietary syndication technology platform for accredited investors and qualified purchasers. With approximately $330m in investments, Renn Global Management LLC is a global alternative investment manager building a next-generation asset management firm providing capital solutions across venture capital, private credit, and web3/digital asset classes.
